sense.def:
A repair
je nekaj, kar naredimo, da popravimo napravo ali stvar, ki je pokvarjena ali ne deluje pravilno.

seg.quote: He had left his car for repairs in the garage.
The chairs are in need of repair.

sense.def:
To repair something
pomeni nekaj, kar je poškodovano ali ne deluje, spet usposobiti.

seg.quote: No one knew how to repair the engine.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj, na primer stavba,
in good repair
, je v dobrem stanju. Če pa je
in bad repair
, je v slabem stanju;

cit.quote: v dobrem ali slabem stanju, dobro ali slabo vzdrževan

sense.def:
To repair an undesirable action or situation
pomeni narediti nekaj, s čimer popravimo nezaželeno dejanje ali stanje;
